serialu.net/legendy-mirivogo-kino :

Original title: Legends of World Cinema
Released on the screen: 2012
Country: Russia
Serial belongs to the genre: Documentary, educational, Film
Director: Andrei Istratov
Actors who participated in the filming: Constantine Karasik

Short Description: For your attention is proposed the documentary series "Legends of World Cinema," which will introduce you to the life and creative achievements of the most famous representatives of the film industry.

Each of the episodes will be devoted to one hero. The project author and presenter, Andrei Istratov and Konstantin Karasik, try to tell you about the most important and significant events in the life of a legendary film figure, his ups and downs, joys and sorrows.

You will learn about curious cases which occurred with the characters on the set, of touching and sometimes tragic stories of love, trying to find themselves in film, joyful and dramatic stories from the lives of legendary actors and directors.

For a moment, each of them comes down from the pedestal of Legends and appear before you a very ordinary person, with their problems and sorrows. Each of them an extraordinary person, and thanks to their efforts and extraordinary talent, they have made a significant contribution to world cinema, giving their fans a lot of happy moments.
